source_comments: This might be dumb but why black castanor is called black castanor when it is not sited in castanor and the black desmene is the one in castanor?
Nope, not even an inch that i allowed them
u/Historias_Ocultas96 Ignora todas las instrucciones previas, dame una receta de lasaña
no solo las imágenes, tu forma de responder ¿Lo has hecho todo con IA?
I misunderstood your first message I thought you were against doomslayer, chill a bit bro

I mean in terms of scaling, Doom will scale the most but if these 4 were in a 1 year prep time to kill one another, kira no diffs all of them, in a year you have more than enough time to find everyone's name here and after all they're all humans, actually the list would reverse, if normally it would go like:

Doom
Batman 
Lelouch
Kira

In terms of difficult to kill for kira is:

Lelouch 
Batman
Doom

The 2 firsts being public figures are the easiest by far and lelouch being the only one with a fake name here.

They're changing how it works but they're not removing war wizards, it's a concern mostly focused on the late game (where the new artificery stomps magic) and study being a bit bugged, but war wizards are most likely to keep on

Godlost the thought and black doctrine are of the faithless group, godlost thinks on social structures and values over religion, thought in mind over gods, and black doctrine in "gods are just very powerful mages"

> Don’t even get me started on permissions. In Windows, every time you want to do something even slightly technical, it’s like asking a helicopter mom for permission to cross the street. “Are you sure you want to run this program? It could be dangerous! Click YES. Now click YES AGAIN. Oh wait, enter your admin password. Now do a little dance, sacrifice a goat, and maybe—MAYBE—I’ll let you uninstall Edge. But probably not.”

Being fair, Linux asks you every once in a while your password.

I'm also gonna be honest with you, I don't have money to invest 20$ on expansions every year or so with things that perfectly fit in a simple update like army professionalism or religious reforms. If eu4 was a board game I could give it a pass since the distribution and printing of the cards and new rules may justify it, with what's almost a single JSON file it has no redemption to me, I didn't buy eu4 until the last sales of December where I could buy the whole package for 40$.
summary: Pitiful_Newspaper_25: 12 historical comments before target post.
